definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: complete (v. BH I. [[[כָּלַל]]]; but ´[[שַׁכ]]: perhaps loan-word from As. šuklulu, ušaklil, uštaklil, DI:WB 331, cf. [[שֵׁיוֵב]], [[שֵׁיחֵא]] and Buhl:14);—

definitions.title: Shaph.
definitions.body: of building: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[שַׁכְלְלֵהּ]] Ezr 5:11 he finished it; 3 mpl. [[שַׁכְּ לִׂלוּ]] Ezr 6:14, also (c. acc. rei) Ezr 4:12 (Kt [[שׁודי אשׁכללו]], read Qr) ´[[שׁוּרַיָא שׁ]]:; Inf. [[לְהַשְׁכְּלָלָה]], acc. rei Ezr 5:3; Ezr 5:9.

definitions.title: Ishtaph.
definitions.body: be completed, of walls ; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִשְׁתַּכְלְלוּן]] Ezr 4:13, Ezr 4:16.
